pages.title: Vault Stone
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Stone$() is a rare type of stone that can be used for the $(#033dfc)Vault Portal$() & the $(#033dfc)Vault Charm Inscription Table$().

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Stone$() can be obtained via Vault Rooms inside the Vault, specifically through the $(#033dfc)Viewer Puzzle Factory$(), which may contain it inside the Vaults, additionaly, a plentiful amount can be found inside a $(#033dfc)Trove Vault$() of its walls.
